content.text: Also #answer1#noteworthy is the low government expenditure on education.
#answer1#This #answer1#graph #answer1#shows #answer1#a #answer1#striking #answer1#difference between the younger age group and the older one.
#answer1#The #answer1#most #answer1#striking #answer1#feature #answer1#of #answer1#the #answer1#graph is #answer1#the #answer1#sudden #answer1#increase in the popularity of computer games.
#answer1#Another #answer1#fact #answer1#worth #answer1#noticing in the table is that females are more numerous than males.
#answer1#The #answer1#most #answer1#remarkable #answer1#point is that the number of males with a criminal record #answer1#increased #answer1#dramatically.
